pages.text:
About Us
Why folks love Gator Trace
Great golf, food, fun and friends at Gator Trace
Gator Trace Golf & Country Club, located on the fringes of the Savannas Preserve with its native vegetation, lakes, ponds and canals, is a beautiful slice of Florida paradise. After a great time on the links, sit on the patio and enjoy a cold drink and a delicious lunch or a Friday dinner as you reconnect. If that sounds like a day in paradise to you, you’re closer than you think. It’s yours already at Gator Trace Golf & Country Club.
About a four-iron shot east of U.S. 1 and west of the Indian River at 4302 Gator Trace Drive off Weatherbee Road, just north of Midway in Fort Pierce (adjacent to Port Saint Lucie and Vero Beach), Gator Trace Golf & Country Club has been offering great golf and an awesome lifestyle since 1986. Our semi-private, semi-public golf course is open for daily play, and also offers annual and seasonal memberships. Gator Trace provides challenging play and the perfect course length for a great golf outing.
With morning and afternoon ad-hoc groups, plus men’s and women’s leagues, you’re sure to find kindred souls to hit the links with as often as you’d like. General Manager and PGA Master Professional Lantie Hughes and his team take great care to make sure every day of golf at Gator Trace is enjoyable and challenging, just the way you like it.
When it comes time for entertainment after the game, you can wet your whistle in the clubhouse, where clubhouse manager Cynthia Hughes oversees a menu that’s casual and scrumptious, with lunch offerings including daily specials on Monday through Saturday from 11 a.m. to 2:30 p.m., dinner on Friday evenings, and a Sunday breakfast from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. that will set the  tone for a superb Sunday. Complimentary helpings of laughter and friendship are served every day.
Gator Trace is a peaceful place of natural beauty and wildlife.
Visit our image gallery
Count on Gator Trace for your:
Special Events
We'll help plan your special party, wedding reception, shower, meeting or luncheon.
Tournaments
Raise funds for your organization by hosting a charity tournament at Gator Trace.
Golf leagues
Men's league plays every Wednesday and our Women's league plays each Thursday.
Making It Happen
All of the things on these pages exist primarily because of the diligent work and abiding care of two very special people, Lantie and Cynthia Hughes. Lantie, General Manager and PGA Master Professional, describes it like this, “Gator Trace is home, so friendly and so comfortable. There are a lot of great courses around here, but people come to Gator Trace because it’s fun. When they walk in the door they know everyone here. People come back season after season and the same people are here. Cynthia and I have been here over 30 years. Many of our staff have been here 20+ years. It’s a familiar and friendly atmosphere. Just a fun place to be.”
Cynthia, Dining & Events Manager, adds, “About 18,000 people come through the dining room each year. There’s a magnitude of responsibility to keeping everything running smoothly, and there are lots of additional activities we are involved in every day. Lantie and I always have such a great time with people, so when we have functions, we enjoy the camaraderie. As far as the business goes, we try to make it fun for everybody, and we’re always looking for things we can do to improve Gator Trace. It’s definitely a labor of love.”
WEBSITE
www.gatortracecountryclub.com
PHONE
Golf Shop  772-464-0407
Clubhouse  772-464-7442
Office 772-468-4653
ADDRESS
4302 Gator Trace Dr., Fort Pierce, FL 34982

About Gator Trace
Gator Trace Golf & Country Club is a semi-private Arthur Hills design par 70, 18-hole championship golf course with a full-service bar and restaurant open to the public year-round.
Address: 4302 Gator Trace Dr.
Fort Pierce FL 34982

Contact Us
Click here to call for tee times: 772-464-0407
The Golf Shop is open from 7 a.m. to 5 p.m. 7 days a week. You need to call to reserve a tee time.
Click here to call the clubhouse: 772-464-7442
Call the clubhouse during business hours with event or restaurant questions, or to buy a Gator Trace gift card. If you're local, you can stop in to the bar to buy a gift card. See below for all association inquiries.
Click here for Gator Trace association information
Head to the website for the Gator Trace Master Association and all sub-associations for community info and estoppel requests:   
http://gatortracemasterassociation.com/
Swing by
We'd love to meet you—stop by and visit! Click the map at the top of this page to get directions from your location.
Send us a message
Complete the form at right to send us an email and we'll get back to you. (No solicitations, please.) For the speediest reply, please call.

Golf Events
Host a charity golf tournament or an outing for your group, or join a league at Gator Trace
Charity Golf Tournaments and Events
Host your next corporate, special event, or charity golf tournament at one of the Treasure Coast’s top-rated courses. Hosting a golf event at Gator Trace Golf & Country Club is a great way to entertain your team or raise funds for your nonprofit or charitable organization. We can also organize a business or social golf event for your group. We think you’ll find our golf course and restaurant facilities and our Treasure Coast location perfect for your outing.
We offer food services for your group that include continental breakfast, a luncheon, and an awards dinner
Raise additional funds with silent auction tables, a 50/50, putting contests, “buy a mulligan” tickets, and hole sponsorships
Both you and your guests will have a great time and you’ll have the benefit of our extensive experience in planning and executing a successful day. To sum up, it’s a great way to raise FUNds!
Looking to host a special occasion like a wedding, reunion or party? Gator Trace is the place!
Click here to go to Special Occasions page
Men's and Women's Leagues
The men’s golf league golfs every Wednesday throughout the year. Call the golf shop at 772-464-0407 for more info.
The Gator Trace Ladies Golf Association golfs every Thursday year-round.
Click here to visit their website
for more information.
Open 7 days a week. Always a great time at Gator Trace!
Want to host a tournament at Gator Trace?
Let us show you why Gator Trace Golf & Country Club is the perfect venue for your next event.
Just complete and submit and we’ll get back to you shortly.

About Gator Trace
Gator Trace Golf & Country Club is a semi-private Arthur Hills design par 70, 18-hole championship golf course with a full-service bar and restaurant open to the public year-round.
Address: 4302 Gator Trace Dr.
Fort Pierce FL 34982

Office 772-468-4653
Map / Directions

Privacy policy
Golf Shop Hours
7:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.
7 days a week
Call for Tee Times
Restaurant Hours
LUNCH Mon.-Sat. 11 a.m. – 2:30 p.m.
DINNER Friday evenings 5 – 8 p.m.
SUNDAY breakfast 8:00 a.m. – 1 p.m.

Golf Membership
Golf membership at Gator Trace offers unlimited golf and more!
JUMP TO MEMBERSHIP RATES
Golf Membership Benefits
Become a member and enjoy all that Gator Trace has to offer, almost any time. With annual and seasonal golf memberships, Gator Trace offers challenging play and a great golf experience for golfers of any level. You’ll love golfing in our relaxed setting—golf every day if you like! And, you'll enjoy priority tee times to help you tee off at your favorite time of the day. There's always a group match to join, active men's and women's leagues, and special events and holiday scrambles. We also host an annual "Members Only" banquet.
Golf Course
Undulating fairways on this semi-private Arthur Hills design par-70 course that incorporates some type of water  — a lake, pond, or canal — on each hole.
Pro Shop
Our Pro Shop stocks all you need. Check out our putters, shoes, men's & women's golf shirts, hats, towels, balls, tees, and more. Get your clubs re-gripped here.
Refreshments
Our restaurant is open for lunch daily and breakfast on Sundays, plus dinner Friday evenings. The bar is open daily. Enjoy a cocktail inside or on our deck.
How It Works
Choose an annual golf membership or a 3-month winter membership. (For a different number of months, please ask.) Add private cart trail fees if you have your own golf cart here; if not, use our carts and pay the "daily member cart fee" each time you play. Or, add an annual or 3-month member cart fee plan to your membership. You can put items purchased at the Pro Shop and tabs from the bar and restaurant on your account. We will mail you an invoice to pay monthly, along with that month's event calendar.
2025 Gator Trace Golf Membership Rates
Membership at Gator Trace is a great deal for golfing enthusiasts and makes a perfect gift — join today!
Membership rates include 7% FL sales tax, plus lots of fun, a beautiful course, great staff, and
clubhouse with dining, social & golf activities!
ANNUAL MEMBERSHIP
Individual
$2,350
Family
$3,450
WINTER (3-MONTH) MEMBERSHIP
Individual
$1,425
Family
$1,975
CLUBHOUSE MEMBERSHIP
Includes charging privileges plus newsletter mailed monthly

CLUBHOUSE PHONE: (772) 464-7442
Call Monday through Friday 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. with golf membership inquiries or to buy a gift card. You can also submit the form at right.
A membership makes a great gift!

About Us
Why folks love Gator Trace
Great golf, food, fun and friends at Gator Trace
Gator Trace Golf & Country Club, located on the fringes of the Savannas Preserve with its native vegetation, lakes, ponds and canals, is a beautiful slice of Florida paradise. After a great time on the links, sit on the patio and enjoy a cold drink and a delicious lunch or a Friday dinner as you reconnect. If that sounds like a day in paradise to you, you’re closer than you think. It’s yours already at Gator Trace Golf & Country Club.
About a four-iron shot east of U.S. 1 and west of the Indian River at 4302 Gator Trace Drive off Weatherbee Road, just north of Midway in Fort Pierce (adjacent to Port Saint Lucie and Vero Beach), Gator Trace Golf & Country Club has been offering great golf and an awesome lifestyle since 1986. Our semi-private, semi-public golf course is open for daily play, and also offers annual and seasonal memberships. Gator Trace provides challenging play and the perfect course length for a great golf outing.
With morning and afternoon ad-hoc groups, plus men’s and women’s leagues, you’re sure to find kindred souls to hit the links with as often as you’d like. General Manager and PGA Master Professional Lantie Hughes and his team take great care to make sure every day of golf at Gator Trace is enjoyable and challenging, just the way you like it.
When it comes time for entertainment after the game, you can wet your whistle in the clubhouse, where clubhouse manager Cynthia Hughes oversees a menu that’s casual and scrumptious, with lunch offerings including daily specials on Monday through Saturday from 11 a.m. to 2:30 p.m., dinner on Friday evenings, and a Sunday breakfast from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. that will set the  tone for a superb Sunday. Complimentary helpings of laughter and friendship are served every day.
Gator Trace is a peaceful place of natural beauty and wildlife.

There are a lot of great courses around here, but people come to Gator Trace because it’s fun. When they walk in the door they know everyone here. People come back season after season and the same people are here. Cynthia and I have been here over 30 years. Many of our staff have been here 20+ years. It’s a familiar and friendly atmosphere. Just a fun place to be.”
Cynthia, Dining & Events Manager, adds, “About 18,000 people come through the dining room each year. There’s a magnitude of responsibility to keeping everything running smoothly, and there are lots of additional activities we are involved in every day. Lantie and I always have such a great time with people, so when we have functions, we enjoy the camaraderie. As far as the business goes, we try to make it fun for everybody, and we’re always looking for things we can do to improve Gator Trace. It’s definitely a labor of love.”

About Us
Why folks love Gator Trace
Great golf, food, fun and friends at Gator Trace
Gator Trace Golf & Country Club, located on the fringes of the Savannas Preserve with its native vegetation, lakes, ponds and canals, is a beautiful slice of Florida paradise. After a great time on the links, sit on the patio and enjoy a cold drink and a delicious lunch or a Friday dinner as you reconnect. If that sounds like a day in paradise to you, you’re closer than you think. It’s yours already at Gator Trace Golf & Country Club.
About a four-iron shot east of U.S. 1 and west of the Indian River at 4302 Gator Trace Drive off Weatherbee Road, just north of Midway in Fort Pierce (adjacent to Port Saint Lucie and Vero Beach), Gator Trace Golf & Country Club has been offering great golf and an awesome lifestyle since 1986. Our semi-private, semi-public golf course is open for daily play, and also offers annual and seasonal memberships. Gator Trace provides challenging play and the perfect course length for a great golf outing.
With morning and afternoon ad-hoc groups, plus men’s and women’s leagues, you’re sure to find kindred souls to hit the links with as often as you’d like. General Manager and PGA Master Professional Lantie Hughes and his team take great care to make sure every day of golf at Gator Trace is enjoyable and challenging, just the way you like it.
When it comes time for entertainment after the game, you can wet your whistle in the clubhouse, where clubhouse manager Cynthia Hughes oversees a menu that’s casual and scrumptious, with lunch offerings including daily specials on Monday through Saturday from 11 a.m. to 2:30 p.m., dinner on Friday evenings, and a Sunday breakfast from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. that will set the  tone for a superb Sunday. Complimentary helpings of laughter and friendship are served every day.
Gator Trace is a peaceful place of natural beauty and wildlife.

About a four-iron shot east of U.S. 1 and west of the Indian River at 4302 Gator Trace Drive off Weatherbee Road, just north of Midway in Fort Pierce (adjacent to Port Saint Lucie and Vero Beach), Gator Trace Golf & Country Club has been offering great golf and an awesome lifestyle since 1986. Our semi-private, semi-public golf course is open for daily play, and also offers annual and seasonal memberships. Gator Trace provides challenging play and the perfect course length for a great golf outing.
With morning and afternoon ad-hoc groups, plus men’s and women’s leagues, you’re sure to find kindred souls to hit the links with as often as you’d like. General Manager and PGA Master Professional Lantie Hughes and his team take great care to make sure every day of golf at Gator Trace is enjoyable and challenging, just the way you like it.

Making It Happen
All of the things on these pages exist primarily because of the diligent work and abiding care of two very special people, Lantie and Cynthia Hughes. Lantie, General Manager and PGA Master Professional, describes it like this, “Gator Trace is home, so friendly and so comfortable. There are a lot of great courses around here, but people come to Gator Trace because it’s fun. When they walk in the door they know everyone here. People come back season after season and the same people are here. Cynthia and I have been here over 30 years. Many of our staff have been here 20+ years. It’s a familiar and friendly atmosphere. Just a fun place to be.”
Cynthia, Dining & Events Manager, adds, “About 18,000 people come through the dining room each year. There’s a magnitude of responsibility to keeping everything running smoothly, and there are lots of additional activities we are involved in every day. Lantie and I always have such a great time with people, so when we have functions, we enjoy the camaraderie. As far as the business goes, we try to make it fun for everybody, and we’re always looking for things we can do to improve Gator Trace. It’s definitely a labor of love.”

Golf Events
Host a charity golf tournament or an outing for your group, or join a league at Gator Trace
Charity Golf Tournaments and Events
Host your next corporate, special event, or charity golf tournament at one of the Treasure Coast’s top-rated courses. Hosting a golf event at Gator Trace Golf & Country Club is a great way to entertain your team or raise funds for your nonprofit or charitable organization. We can also organize a business or social golf event for your group. We think you’ll find our golf course and restaurant facilities and our Treasure Coast location perfect for your outing.
We offer food services for your group that include continental breakfast, a luncheon, and an awards dinner
Raise additional funds with silent auction tables, a 50/50, putting contests, “buy a mulligan” tickets, and hole sponsorships
Both you and your guests will have a great time and you’ll have the benefit of our extensive experience in planning and executing a successful day. To sum up, it’s a great way to raise FUNds!
Looking to host a special occasion like a wedding, reunion or party? Gator Trace is the place!
Click here to go to Special Occasions page
Men's and Women's Leagues
The men’s golf league golfs every Wednesday throughout the year. Call the golf shop at 772-464-0407 for more info.
The Gator Trace Ladies Golf Association golfs every Thursday year-round.
Click here to visit their website
for more information.
Open 7 days a week. Always a great time at Gator Trace!
